skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Skraevold are a bloodthirsty tribe within Aesling territory known for their cannabilistic ways.

effects.description: Leadership: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Not many Norscans are known to maintain alliances with Beastmen, yet the Aesling look upon them as equals.
Skraevold Marauders fight in the name of the Blood God with sheer determination and unending fury.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Giant units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Norscan Giant & Bile Giant units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Beastlike mutations are welcomed if not embraced by the warriors who have risen through the ranks of the Skraevold.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Like most Aesling tribes the Skraevold do not mind selling of kin to the highest bidder if it benefits them in any way.
Kolsveinn mutates with each boon recieved by Khorne, his beastlike features proof of his ritualistic ambition. Khorne's praise his only wish.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The indomitable Jarl of Skraevold is also known as the Scourge of the Baersonling.
